channel.title: 474 Help
channel.description: can any one give me the codes for 474 ::matser and pure or setlevel

item.title: 474 Help
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“tameer, post:6, topic:527084”][quote author=Null Amount link=topic=645832.msg4343811#msg4343811 date=1375557643]
Please don’t use ^.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master")) { for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, i); } } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure")) { //iirc, skill 1 is defence. for (int i = 2; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(1400000, i); addSkillXp(1400000, 0); } }
[/quote]Where i need to add this^?[/quote]Wherever your server handles commands.

Read full topic
